Ledger Object Things¶

Info pertaining to ledger object manipulation.

class xrpl_plugin.ledger_objects.LedgerEntryType¶

Bases: pybind11_object

Identifiers for on-ledger objects. Each ledger object requires a unique type identifier, which is stored within the object itself; this makes it possible to iterate the entire ledger and determine each object’s type and verify that the object you retrieved from a given hash matches the expected type.

ltACCOUNT_ROOT = <LedgerEntryType.ltACCOUNT_ROOT: 97>¶

xrpl_plugin.ledger_objects.adjust_owner_count(arg0: xrpl_plugin.transactors.ApplyView, arg1: xrpl_plugin.stypes.STLedgerEntry, arg2: int, arg3: xrpl_plugin.basic_types.Journal) → None¶

Adjust the owner count of an account after creating/deleting a new ledger object.
